name: Micro Dash
description:
Tip: Play the demo first.

In the middle 1980's I was a kid of seven or eight years. My uncle had got a brand new commodore 64 computer and my younger brother and I used to play all the exciting games of that times. For me at this time, the world was full of monsters dungeons and dragons hiding in the shadows. It was a fantastic time and I remember myself fighting through all this particularly hard games lost in the 8-Bit worlds that turned into real adventures.

This is a tribute to these times and to two of my favorite games at this time called Boulder Dash (C-64) and Metroid (NES)

Micro Dash is Boulder Dash like game but with a lot of new elements and metroidvania features like tiny story-line, power-ups and a lot of secrets and hidden caves. The graphics and sound is close to the one from the original C-64 Boulder Dash from 1986. Also the game-play is similar to the original. The player controls Nano, who must dig through caves collecting gems and diamonds and reach the exit, while avoiding various types of dangerous creatures as well as falling rocks or get killed by an underground explosion.

Features:
  • Up to four game save slots. Players can use different game slots to play together by player-rotation
  • Six worlds with about 10 to 20 caves per world to eke out plus bonus world
  • Up to six power-ups. Each power-up gives you a unique ability
  • Secrets and hidden rooms that are waiting to be found
  • A lot of new elements like Emeralds, Ghosts and Spiders, Keys, Doors and Portals, Laval, Slime and more
  • Up to six different color themes and six different extra cave themes
  •  Multiple goals such like: 
    • Solve all caves 
    • find all power-ups 
    • find THE lost diamond 
    • find all secrets and opals and unlock the bonus world 
    • make a high score

You can freely download a demo version for your system to test if everything is running properly and if you like the game at all. The demo version is limited to only one world and one power-up. If you like the game, you are very welcome to buy the full version to play all the worlds, find all the secrets, power-ups and THE lost diamond.

If something is not running properly on your system, please post it in the comments/forum or send an e-mail.

Have a lot of fun! Installation:

Unzip the downloaded file wherever you want. Start the file microdash or microdash_demo by double-click.

For windows you can add the including icon.ico file as an app-icon and if you want to run the game from Desktop or anywhere else, create a shortcut by right-click on the exe file and choose Create Shortcut. Drag the shortcut file wherever you want to start the game

For Linux you will find a prepared script named desktopSetup that will create  a microdash.desktop file for you. Just run the desktopSetup script and place the generated microdash.desktop file wherever you want. Double-click for startup.

Microdash for Mac is coming soon.
